resources.string:
Singapore officially the republic of Singapore,
and often referred to as the Lion City,
the Garden City,and the red Dot,is a global city
in southeast Asia and the world's only island city
state.It lies on degree(137 km) north of the quarter,
at the southernmost tip of continental Asia and peninsular
Malaysia with Indonesia Riau island to the south .Singapore
territory consists of diamond shaped main island and 62 islets
